thread.title: Khloe Kardashian talks Valentine's Day plans on Ellen show | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Khloe Kardashian talks Valentine's Day plans on Ellen show | Daily Mail Online

author: Sarah Sotoodeh For Dailymail.Com
title: Khloe Kardashian talks Valentine's Day plans on Ellen show | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 632 shares She said she plans on having 'food waiting for him when he comes home and maybe looking 'a little sexy.' For her Ellen appearance, Khloe wowed in a see-through bodysuit with a bralette beneath, adding matching black leggings and heels. Having some fun: During her appearance on the morning show, the 32-year-old revealed that she's be spending time with her NBA beau in Cleveland for the annual romantic holiday Good sport: The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star told Ellen about her Tuesday plans: 'I've been with him since the summer time and I am going to be in Cleveland with Tristan' The Revenge Body With Khloe Kardashian host also talked about her grueling workout regiment. The blonde beauty, who mentioned she worked out 5 AM that day, spoke about her sister Kim Kardashian versus her own take on working out. Khloe said her nutritionist told her Kim 'has a metabolism of a Ferrari' while she 'has one of a Honda Civic.' The reality star said she told the nutritionist: 'You just summed up my whole life right there. Kim's the Ferrari and I'm the Honda.' Having a laugh: The blonde beauty, who mentioned she worked out 5 AM that day, spoke about her sister Kim Kardashian versus her own take on working out Flawless: The Revenge Body With Khloe Kardashian host also talked about her grueling workout regiment Khloe said that while she was in Costa Rica with her family last month, she did a workout with Kim - who strolled in thirty minutes late for their fitness session. While she says Kim, 36, works out every day, her intensity level is much different than her own. Khloe said 'I can't handle people like that. I'm like a man drenched' in sweat 'and a beast and growling in the gym and she's like lifting a weight and being cute.' In good humor: The statuesque star also took part in a game where she did different workouts while displaying different emotions, from sexy to scared to drunk So in love: She's been dating the Cleveland Cavaliers star since summer 2016 On a more serious note, the reality star talked about what triggered her past weight gain. She said: 'I realized from my dad's death and through my divorce, I would always eat my emotions and that was something i didn't realize I was doing.' Adding: 'Every time I was sad or stressed out, I would eat eat eat.' Stage star: Also on the show was Lin-Manuel Miranda of Hamilton fame His time to shine: Lin-Manuel talked about his first Oscar nomination and how it feels to be eligible to win one of the most coveted accolades in entertainment She said that instead of turning to food, she now focused on the gym, which was a great 'stress reliever.' The statuesque star also took part in a game with Ellen where she did different workouts while displaying different emotions, from sexy to scared to drunk. Also on the show was Lin-Manuel Miranda of Hamilton fame. They have on the same blazer! The actor and the talk show host seem to have the same stylist
